nodes.text: Gargovik was a human TIE fighter pilot in Squadron Three of the Galactic Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing during the Galactic Civil War between the Empire and the New Republic. In 5 ABY, Gargovik was one of Captain Wisp's TIE pilots based on the bulk freighter Yadeez. Gargovik shared an intimate relationship with fellow Squadron Three pilot Duchas Cherroi, who were often seen together between missions.
Gargovik appeared in the 2021 novel Victory's Price, written by Alexander Freed.
